LanguageData.MedicalOperationSpeed.label: operointinopeus
LanguageData.MedicalSurgerySuccessChance.label: medical surgery success chance
LanguageData.MedicalSurgerySuccessChance.description: The likelihood that a character will succeed when attempting to perform a medical surgery. Failures can result in simple wasted time and medicine, or catastrophic damage to the patient. This base success chance is also affected by the facilities and medicine used in the operation, and the difficulty of the operation.
LanguageData.MedicalTendQuality.label: medical tend quality
LanguageData.MedicalTendQuality.description: Quality of tending given to patients when acting as a doctor.
LanguageData.MedicalTendSpeed.label: medical tend speed
LanguageData.MedicalTendSpeed.description: Speed at which the character tends to wounds and illnesses as a doctor.
